Define Documentation

#define DEBUG_SUBSYSTEM   S_LDLM

This file contains implementation of IBITS lock type.

IBITS lock type contains a bit mask determining various properties of an object. The meanings of specific bits are specific to the caller and are opaque to LDLM code.

Locks with intersecting bitmasks and conflicting lock modes (e.g. LCK_PW) are considered conflicting. See the lock mode compatibility matrix in lustre_dlm.h.
